text: Widgey R. Newman (1900–1944) was a British screenwriter, producer and film director.Chibna;; p.20 He was a major force in the British B film industry of the 1930s, overseeing the production of a number of quota quickies. ==Selected filmography== * A Reckless Gamble (1928) * Little Waitress (1932) * Heroes of the Mine (1932) * Lucky Blaze (1933) * Immortal Gentleman (1935) * On Velvet (1938) * Men Without Honour (1939) * Two Smart Men (1940) * Henry Steps Out (1940) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Chibnall, Steve. Quota Quickies: The British of the British 'B' Film.
